# Zachary King - Fractional GTM Leader

> Zachary King builds AI-powered GTM (go-to-market) infrastructure for B2B startups. Based in Melbourne, Australia. 20+ years in B2B sales, from $25M enterprise deals to building AI-powered revenue systems for early-stage companies.

## About

Zachary King is a fractional GTM leader who helps founders move from founder-led sales to scalable, AI-enabled revenue engines, without hiring a full-time VP Sales too early. He operates through Fractional Enterprises Pty Ltd.

He is not a traditional sales consultant. He embeds as a GTM leader inside startups, builds working infrastructure (playbooks, AI agents, outbound systems), and hands it all off when the engagement ends. Everything stays with the client.

## GTM Swarm

GTM Swarm is Zachary's core methodology. Strategy becomes a playbook, the playbook becomes AI agents, and the agents become systems that scale without hiring.

Six specialized AI agents are deployed in a client's own AI platform (Claude, Microsoft Copilot, or other enterprise tools):

- Prospecting Agent: ICP-matched company research, decision-maker identification, personalized outbound drafting
- Discovery Agent: Pre-call research, qualification criteria, tech stack analysis
- Demo Agent: Value prop mapping, pain-to-feature alignment, real-time ROI building
- Objection Agent: Proven reframes, competitive differentiation, objection-to-signal conversion
- Deal Strategy Agent: Buying committee mapping, blocker identification, multi-threading
- RevOps Agent: CRM automation, data-driven forecasting, pipeline risk detection

All agents are trained on the client's specific playbook and deployed in their own systems. The infrastructure keeps working after the engagement ends.

## Services

### GTM Diagnostic ($1,950)
One-week GTM audit. Identifies what is broken, delivers a prioritized 90-day roadmap, and seeds the first outbound campaign (300+ prospects). Fast, focused diagnosis.
URL: https://zacharyking.com.au/services/

### GTM Swarm Sprint ($30,000)
90-day full deployment. Complete sales playbook, six AI agents deployed, outbound engine with live campaigns (600+ prospects contacted), weekly sales rhythm established, and AI automation saving 8-12 hours per client. Everything stays with the client.
URL: https://zacharyking.com.au/services/

### Fractional GTM ($9,000/month)
Embedded GTM leadership. Works inside the client's CRM, tools, and team. Builds AI-powered workflows, runs active deals, coaches the team, and provides weekly sales meetings plus async support. Flexible engagement, cancel anytime.
URL: https://zacharyking.com.au/services/

### Swarm Subscription ($1,500/month)
Post-engagement support. Keeps AI agents online and updated, provides quarterly updates, async support, and continuous access to new automation skills. No lock-in.
URL: https://zacharyking.com.au/services/

## Ideal Clients

- B2B SaaS, AI, or workflow platform companies
- Pre-seed to Series A/B stage, or $1-10M annual revenue
- 5-30 employees
- Founder-led or early-stage sales motion
- Post-funding trigger moment (just raised, need to deploy capital efficiently)
- Product-obsessed founders who want sales without killing the founder vibe

## 4-Step Process

1. Diagnose: Audit current GTM, identify what is broken, prioritize fixes
2. Build: Create sales playbook, deploy AI infrastructure on the client's platform
3. Train: Enable the team through live sessions and real deal support
4. Scale: Client keeps everything. System continues working independently.

URL: https://zacharyking.com.au/how-it-works/
